akas: The Houstons: On Our Own (original title)
The Houston Family Chronicles USA (working title)
akas from release info: The Houstons: On Our Own (original title)
The Houston Family Chronicles USA (working title)

1.title: 100 White Roses

episode of.title: The Houstons: On Our Own (TV Series 2012)

1.plot: The Houston family unites for their first Mother s day without Whitney. Bobbi Kristina makes an unexpected announcement about her relationship with Nick.

2.title: We've Got a Problem

episode of.title: The Houstons: On Our Own (TV Series 2012)

2.plot: Despite Pat's efforts to involve Bobbi Kristina in more family and career activities, Bobbi Kristina finds that her time is better spent with her fiance.

3.title: Nothing Saint About Simon

episode of.title: The Houstons: On Our Own (TV Series 2012)

3.plot: Pat takes a lovesick Krissy out of town for a ladies' weekend. When Nick decides to crash the trip, Gary and Ray teach him a lesson about responsibility.

4.title: Too Little, Too Late

episode of.title: The Houstons: On Our Own (TV Series 2012)

4.plot: Nick and Krissy stay at home while Pat takes the rest of the family to LA for BET's tribute to Whitney. Back in Georgia, Krissy's grief gets the best of her.

5.title: Moving Pieces

episode of.title: The Houstons: On Our Own (TV Series 2012)

5.plot: Nick and Pat try to get Krissy's mind off her mother - Nick with a carefree day of puppy adoption, and Pat with some practical furniture shopping for the apartment. Pat challenges Gary to a game of basketball to see who is in better shape.

6.title: Cupcakes for Krissy

episode of.title: The Houstons: On Our Own (TV Series 2012)

6.plot: Believing that the best solution for Krissy s problems is to surround her with family, Pat invites Krissy s godmother, CeCe Winans, over for dinner. The night quickly devolves after Krissy's cousin Meeta calls her out for her bad behavior.

7.title: A Cabin in the Mountains

episode of.title: The Houstons: On Our Own (TV Series 2012)

7.plot: The Houstons head to the mountains for a spiritual retreat, but healing is put on hold when someone is rushed to the hospital.

8.title: Calling All Houstons

episode of.title: The Houstons: On Our Own (TV Series 2012)

8.plot: The sudden trip to the hospital serves as a wake up call. Pat is stuck between a rock and a hard place as she tries to balance spending time with both Krissy and her daughter.

9.title: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner

episode of.title: The Houstons: On Our Own (TV Series 2012)

9.plot: Cissy Houston s arrival in town shakes things up in the Houston household and doesn't bring the welcome she'd hoped from Krissy. Krissy is MIA from family activities as she tries to get her career on track by focusing on acting.

10.title: All That Sparkles

episode of.title: The Houstons: On Our Own (TV Series 2012)

10.plot: The Houston family travels to Los Angeles to attend the red carpet premiere of Sparkle, but it's a bittersweet moment without Whitney.

11.title: A Houston Family Vacation

episode of.title: The Houstons: On Our Own (TV Series 2012)

11.plot: Pat whisks the family away to a spiritual retreat in Hawaii, where their guides invoke island ceremonies to help the Houstons move on with their lives without forgetting Whitney.

12.title: We Are Family

episode of.title: The Houstons: On Our Own (TV Series 2012)

12.plot: Krissy tries to be proactive about moving past her grieving by finding a new apartment, but cracks in her relationship with Nick start to show. Meanwhile, Gary struggles with the ramifications of neglecting his health.

13.title: New Beginnings: Part 1

episode of.title: The Houstons: On Our Own (TV Series 2012)

13.plot: Nick and Krissy throw a housewarming party, but not without Pat's help. Will Bobby Brown make an appearance? Krissy reveals that Nick isn't the only man in her life.

14.title: New Beginnings: Part 2

episode of.title: The Houstons: On Our Own (TV Series 2012)

14.plot: Pat gives Nick and Gary some unwelcome news about her plans to jumpstart Krissy's career.

imdb.plot outline: Largely centers on Patricia Houston as she and the family continue to grapple with Whitney Houston's passing and as she and Gary (Houston's brother) raise their teenage daughter and support Bobbi Kristina, the late singer's daughter, while maintaining the Grammy winner's business and estate.
imdb.title: The Houstons: On Our Own
plot: Largely centers on 'Patricia Houston' (qv) as she and the family continue to grapple with 'Whitney Houston' (qv)'s passing and as she and Gary (Houston's brother) raise their teenage daughter and support Bobbi Kristina, the late singer's daughter, while maintaining the Grammy winner's business and estate.::Lifetime
